TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Label extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class Label Inherits WebControl Implements ITextControl
public ref class Label : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::ITextControl
type Label = class inherit WebControl interface ITextControl

summary.span: 表示一个标签控件，该控件在网页上显示文本。

span.span: Represents a label control, which displays text on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来显示在页面上的固定位置中的文本。Use the control to display text in a set location on the page. 与静态文本不同，你可以自定义通过显示的文本属性。Unlike static text, you can customize the displayed text through the property. 你还可以使用和控件以在 Web 窗体页上显示文本。You can also use the and controls to display text on the Web Forms page. 但是，与不同控件，这些控件不呈现任何其他标记。However, unlike the control, these controls do not render any additional tags. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control can be used to display user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建在网页上的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 ASP.NET Web 页代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the ASP.NET Web page code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Label Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Label Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例控件。The following example shows how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). param.name: writer
param.span: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 添加要呈现到指定输出流的 控件的 HTML 特性和样式。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of a control to render to the specified output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用要插入的其他属性和样式输出流控件。The method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles to the output stream for a control. 方法控件将确定是否`for`属性应与添加值，并且如果应该应用的内联块样式以显示边框样式和宽度。The method for a control determines whether the `for` attribute should be added with the value, and if the inline-block style should be applied to display the border style and width.

exception.span: 未能找到 属性中指定的控件。

span.span: The control specified in the property cannot be found.

param.name: obj
param.span: 表示已分析元素的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the parsed element.

summary.span: 通知控件某元素已经过分析，并将该元素添加到 控件。

span.span: Notifies the control that an element was parsed and adds the element to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控件开发人员使用方法，派生自定义控件从时类。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. 如果输入的对象是，和控件具有任何子控件，该输入的对象用于设置属性控件。If the input object is a , and the control has no child controls, the input object is used to set the property of the control. 否则为基方法类称为和指定的对象添加到集合。Otherwise, the method of the base class is called and the specified object is added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写在自定义的方法服务器控制，以便它始终将文本属性设置为已分析的对象的文本属性，如果分析的对象是，和为空字符串否则为。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_label_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_label_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_label_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_label_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件关联的服务器控件的标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for a server control that the control is associated with.

value.span: 一个字符串，对应于 Web 窗体中包含的服务器控件的 。

span.span: A string value corresponding to the for a server control contained in the Web form.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示 控件不与其他服务器控件相关联。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), indicating that the control is not associated with another server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相关联属性与 Web 窗体上的其他服务器控件的控件。Use the property to associate a control with another server control on a Web form. 当控件与其他服务器控件相关联，其属性可以用于扩展关联的控件的功能。When a control is associated with another server control, its attributes can be used to extend the functionality of the associated control. 你可以使用另一个控件，或标题可设置的选项卡索引或关联控件的热键控件。You can use the control as a caption for another control, or you can set the tab index or hot key for an associated control. 当设置属性，控件呈现为 HTML`label`元素，与`for`属性设置为关联控件的属性。When the property is set, the control renders as an HTML `label` element, with the `for` attribute set to the property of the associated control. 你可以设置的其他特性`label`元素使用属性。You can set other attributes of the `label` element using the properties. 例如，你可以使用和属性以提供标题和关联控件的热键。For example, you can use the and properties to provide the caption and hot key for an associated control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LoadViewState (object savedState);

param.name: savedState
param.span: 包含控件的已保存视图状态值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的控件的状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved state for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法还原视图状态信息控件从保存的一个页面请求方法。The method restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定与关联的值控件。Use the property to determine the value that is associated with a control. 属性主要由控件开发人员使用。The property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of the control.
The text content of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定的文本内容控件。Use the property to specify or determine the text content of the control. 此属性通常用于以编程方式自定义中显示的文本控件。This property is commonly used to programmatically customize the text that is displayed in the control. 属性可以包含 HTML。The property can include HTML. 如果是这样，HTML 将被原样传递到浏览器中，在其中它可能被解释为标记而不是文本。If it does, the HTML will be passed unchanged to the browser, where is might be interpreted as markup and not as text. 如果你想要显示为纯文本的 HTML 标记的浏览器，则可以使用方法，如类概述的示例中所示。If you want the browser to display HTML markup as plain text, you can use the method, as shown in the example for the class overview. 你还可以使用而不是控制控制，并设置属性。You can also use the control instead of the control, and set the property to . > [!NOTE] > 设置属性将清除中包含的任何其他控件控件。Setting the property will clear any other controls contained in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control can be used to display user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 此属性是默认属性，对象绑定，以在运行时。This property is the default property that a object binds to at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅， ，和[与用于筛选的数据源控件使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information, see , , and [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的新实例控件并设置其属性。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and set its property. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
